description: New from Ecentrik Artistry comes the Ecentrik track jacket!  This unisex jacket comes in 3 different colors: Black, Red, and Green.

description: The "Guide To Success" long sleeve t-shirt is an ash grey color and features magenta and teal lettering.  Available in sizes small to 3X Large

description: The "Wildlife" (aka Born To Be Wild) hoodie is a perfect match for the Jordan I Snow Leopard customs.  Unisex hoodie available in sizes Small to 3XL.

description: Something new to keep you warm this winter.  The Ballpark hoodie features the Ecentrik Artistry logo done in a baseball team logo style on a navy blue hoodie.  This is a unisex item available in sizes Small to 3XL.

description: The "Peel" hooded sweatshirt is based off a previously released limited edition t-shirt featuring the same design.  This is a limited edition item.  Also available in youth sizes.

description: The "Made Fresh Daily" cotton sweatshirt.  Available in sizes small to 3X Large.

description:
Here's your chance to wear a lava lamp on your feet!  Although not illuminated like the real thing, the Lava Lamp custom air force one low contains the same crazy, wavy, water-like design that you would see in an actual lava lamp.  This is a general release shoe that is available in both men and women sizes (if desired size is not listed, please send email to info@ecentrikart.net to see if desired size can be special ordered).

name: "Noir" Custom Air Force Ones
description:
Noir (pronounced "nwr") Is the french word for "black", and is related to the term "Film Noir", which is a term used to describe crime fiction featuring hard-boiled cynical characters and bleak sleazy settings (think "Sin City" comic/movie style).  These custom shoes were heavily influenced by the gritty black & white style seen in that same artform.  These shoes are available in men sizes only and come with a hand painted custom "Noir" shoe box.
